requirement: Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all privileged accounts
remediation: Enable MFA in identity provider (Okta, Azure AD, etc.) and enforce it via policy.

requirement: Encrypt sensitive data at rest using AES-256
remediation: Enable database-level encryption (TDE) or configure disk encryption.

requirement: Disable unused ports and protocols on servers
remediation: Use firewall rules and configuration management to close unused ports.
Deploy a SIEM or central log server and configure all endpoints to forward logs.

requirement: Implement daily backup of critical financial data
remediation: Automate daily backups using backup software and test restore procedures weekly.

requirement: Conduct quarterly vulnerability assessments and penetration tests
remediation: Engage a CERT-IN empaneled vendor to run quarterly VAPT and fix findings.
